code: export var isValidEmail=function isValidEmail(email){var emailPattern=/^[^\s@]+@[^\s@]+\.[^\s@]+$/;if(emailPattern.test(email))return true;else return false;};export var isValidPasswrd=function isValidPasswrd(passwrd){var strPasswrd=passwrd.toString();if(strPasswrd.length>5)return true;else return false;};export var isValidPhoneNum=function isValidPhoneNum(number){var strNumber=number===null||number===void 0?void 0:number.toString();if(Number.isInteger(Number(number))&&strNumber.length>3)return true;else return false;};var allowedImgExtensions=/(\.jpg|\.jpeg|\.png|\.gif|\.jfif|\.webp)$/i;export var isValideImgFileExtn=function isValideImgFileExtn(fileName){if(allowedImgExtensions.exec(fileName))return true;else return false;};
